data.title: Clear to Rocketeer!
data.meta_description: The Rocketeer blasts onto mobile gaming with a new Workinman-developed 3D title! New Disney Junior animated series follows a young girl named Kit, who finds ...
data.text:
The Rocketeer blasts onto mobile gaming with a new Workinman-developed 3D title!

New Disney Junior animated series follows a young girl named Kit, who finds out she’s next in line to become the world renowned Rocketeer, after receiving a mysterious package for her birthday. With her newfound gear and secret identity, Kit becomes a legendary superhero who saves the day for all. Joined by her gadget-minded best friend, Tesh, and airplane-mechanic uncle, Ambrose, no challenge is too great for this Rocketeer!

Workinman’s latest Disney title brings the series to mobile devices with outstanding 3D graphics and effects. Taking from the endless runner genre, each level in The Rocketeer was skillfully designed with procedurally generated obstacles to keep players on their toes as they fly over breathtaking scenes, dogging obstacles and soaring circles around the bad guys. Activating power-ups seamlessly transitions the character into complex and eye catching animations that are a blast to pull off! Awesome Boss battles (with refreshing play mechanics keep the game fresh the player with every play.

Developed in Unity Engine, the game puts the powers of the Rocketeer in your fingertips. Jet your way through tons of exciting environments, dodging harrowing obstacles while collecting coins throughout each level. Along the way, familiar friends will swoop by to deliver some sweet power ups. Hold on to your helmet, because these things make you go SUPER fast!
